languages.text: "Смиренно заявляю, что почтенный Леттард был равнодушен к счастью недорогих ему родственников, которых вы сделали богачами. И не был бы удовлетворен сим правосудием".

"I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."
languages.original_text: "Смиренно заявляю, что почтенный Леттард был равнодушен к счастью недорогих ему родственников, которых вы сделали богачами. И не был бы удовлетворен сим правосудием".

traits.locale_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."
"I humbly declare that I am indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of my notional kinspeople who you have made rich. And that I am not satisfied with this ruling."
"I humbly declare that I am indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of my estranged kinspeople who you have made rich. And that I am not satisfied with this ruling."
"I humbly declare that I am indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of my estranged kinspeople who you have made rich. And that I am not satisfied with this ruling."

"I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

"I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

"I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

languages.text: « Je déclare humblement que l'honorable Lettard était totalement indifférent au sort de ses semblables, quand bien même vous les avez rendus riches. Et j'ajoute que votre décision serait loin de le satisfaire. »
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

traits.locale_text: « Je déclare humblement que l'honorable Lettard était totalement indifférent au sort de ses semblables, quand bien même vous les avez rendus riches. Et j'ajoute que votre décision serait loin de le satisfaire. »
« Je déclare humblement être totalement indifférent au sort de mes semblables, quand bien même vous les avez rendus riches. Et j'ajoute que votre décision est loin de me satisfaire. »

languages.text: «Humildemente, declaro que el venerable Lettard era indiferente a la fortuna, buena o mala, de sus parientes distantes a quienes va a enriquecer y que no queda satisfecho con el veredicto».
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

traits.locale_text: «Humildemente, declaro que el venerable Lettard era indiferente a la fortuna, buena o mala, de sus parientes distantes a quienes va a enriquecer y que no queda satisfecho con el veredicto».
«Humildemente, declaro que soy indiferente a la fortuna, buena o mala, de mis parientes distantes a quienes va a enriquecer y que no quedo satisfecho con el veredicto».

languages.text: 「僭越ながら、名誉あるレタードにとって、あなた様が恵んでくださった疎遠な親戚の財産などが何であろうとどうでもいいのです。そして、彼はこの判決に満足していないことでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

traits.locale_text: 「僭越ながら、名誉あるレタードにとって、あなた様が恵んでくださった疎遠な親戚の財産などが何であろうとどうでもいいのです。そして、彼はこの判決に満足していないことでしょう」
「僭越ながら、あなた様が恵んでくださった疎遠な親戚の財産など、何であろうとどうでもいいのです。そして、私はこの判決に満足しておりません」

languages.text: “我谦卑地声明，尊敬的莱塔德并不在乎钱财，也不在意他那些关系疏远的亲戚会不会一夜暴富。他对这样的裁决并不满意。”
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

traits.locale_text: “我谦卑地声明，尊敬的莱塔德并不在乎钱财，也不在意他那些关系疏远的亲戚会不会一夜暴富。他对这样的裁决并不满意。”
“我谦卑地声明，我并不在乎钱财，也不在意我那些关系疏远的亲戚会不会一夜暴富。我对这样的裁决并不满意。”

languages.text: Ich erkläre demütig, dass dem geschätzten Lettard die Geschicke, ob gut oder schlecht, seiner entfremdeten Verwandten, die Ihr reich gemacht habt, gleichgültig waren. Und er wäre mit diesem Urteilsspruch nicht zufrieden.
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."

traits.locale_text: Ich erkläre demütig, dass dem geschätzten Lettard die Geschicke, ob gut oder schlecht, seiner entfremdeten Verwandten, die Ihr reich gemacht habt, gleichgültig waren. Und er wäre mit diesem Urteilsspruch nicht zufrieden.
"Ich erkläre demütig, dass mir die Geschicke, ob gut oder nicht, meiner entfremdeten Verwandten, die Ihr reich gemacht habt, gleichgültig sind. Und dass ich mit diesem Urteil nicht zufrieden bin."

languages.text: "Tüm tevazumla beyan etmek isterim ki muhterem Lettard, sizin elinizden zengin olmuş tüm o ayrı düştüğü akrabalarının iyi ya da kötü talihlerine karşı kayıtsız birisiydi. Bundandır ki bu hükümden memnun olmazdı."
languages.original_text: "I humbly declare that the esteemed Lettard was indifferent to the fortunes, good or otherwise, of his estranged kinspeople whom you have made rich. And that he would not be satisfied with this ruling."
